comment: Really liked her. So sweet and innocent looking. My only drawback was this class was almost 3 hours and we did tons of busy work. Sometimes it's not a bad thing to let us go a few minutes early, but not the case here. Otherwise very easy and a great teacher.

I love love loved this class! It was very informative, organized, and fun.  She was very fair in her grading and made the assignment applicable to real life! NO TESTS!! I would take her for under water basket weaving if she taught it!
